long_description: The lightweight Scott Contessa CR1 carbon women's bike uses an aerodynamic design to reduce shock and vibration, so you can enjoy long rides and not feel beat up at the end of the day. Full-carbon frame is designed to maximize aerodynamic efficiency using foil-inspired tube shapes, all while offering a road racing geometry for exceptional handling. Additional frame highlights include carbon dropouts with replaceable hanger, oversized, stiff bottom bracket, tapered head tube and internal cable routing. All-carbon fork with tapered steerer ensures precision when carving turns at speed. Shimano Tiagra drivetrain reliably guides you through 30 speeds. Syncros Pro Race 27 rims feature grippy and fact Schwalbe Lugano tires. Please note: pedals are sold separately. Specs on the Scott Contessa CR1 carbon women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: The lightweight Scott Contessa CR1 carbon women's bike uses an aerodynamic design to reduce shock and vibration, so you can enjoy long rides and not feel beat up at the end of the day.
